hero.title: Our Free Course Programs
hero.description: HEAL Student platform provides 6 courses led by expert facilitators for 90 minutes online.

courseOutline.title: Available Course List
courseOutline.description: Each course is designed to provide deep understanding of holistic health with practical and sustainable approaches.

1.title: Introduction to Balanced Nutrition and Eating Patterns
topics: Introduction to balanced nutrition needed by the body
Various foods that contain appropriate nutrition
How much nutrition is needed by the body
The importance of consuming balanced nutrition for the body
Why eating patterns need to be managed

2.title: Introduction to Psychology
topics: Introduction to various psychological problems and their characteristics
Why psychological health must be maintained and its impact

3.title: Introduction to Mental Health
topics: How to prevent disturbed mental health

4.title: Synergizing Physical and Mental Health
topics: The importance of synergy between physical and mental health
How to synergize physical and mental health

5.title: Implementing Physical and Mental Health
topics: How to implement physical and mental health in daily life

6.title: Evaluation of Physical and Mental Health
topics: Evaluation of physical and mental health from implementation results
